parameters.name: Operations
parameters.query:
endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| where Workload_s != "SecurityComplianceCenter"
| summarize Count = count() by Operation_s
| order by Count desc, Operation_s asc
| project Value = Operation_s, Label = strcat(Operation_s, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
O365DLP_CL
| where Workload_s in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| where ExchangeMetaData_From_s != ""
| summarize Count = count() by ExchangeMetaData_From_s
| order by Count desc, ExchangeMetaData_From_s asc
| project Value = ExchangeMetaData_From_s, Label = strcat(ExchangeMetaData_From_s, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| where Workload_s != "SecurityComplianceCenter"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| join kind = inner 
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| summarize Count = count() by DisplayName
| order by Count desc, DisplayName asc
| project Value = DisplayName, Label = strcat(DisplayName, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let data = (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| join kind = inner 
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label);
data
| summarize Count = count() by Workload_s
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Workload_s:string)['Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams']) on Workload_s
| project Workload_s = iff(Workload_s == '', Workload_s1, Workload_s), Count = iff(Workload_s == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Workload_s)
    on Workload_s
| project-away Workload_s1, CreationTime_t
| extend Workload_s = Workload_s
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend Workload_s = 'All', Workload_ss = '*'  
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10

let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist2 = (_GetWatchlist('MipMap'));
let dlp= (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
| extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
| extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
| extend Type = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "","ActionSource","")
| extend Value = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "","LabelEventType","")
| extend Value2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "","LocationType","")
| extend Value3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "",toint(TargetLocation_d),dynamic(""))
| extend old1 = tostring(SensitivityLabelEventData_OldSensitivityLabelId_g)
);
let data = (dlp
| join kind = inner
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type = tostring(Type)
)
on Type,Value
| extend ActionSource = Name
| join kind = leftouter  
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value2 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type2 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type2,Value2
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value3 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type3 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type3,Value3
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend old1 = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on old1
| extend label = DisplayName
| extend oldlabel = DisplayName1
| extend ActionSource = Name
| extend LabelEventType =Name1
| extend LocationType =Name2
);
data
| where LocationType != ""
| summarize Count = count() by LocationType
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(LocationType:string)['Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams']) on LocationType
| project LocationType = iff(LocationType == '', LocationType1, LocationType), Count = iff(LocationType == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by LocationType)
    on LocationType
| project-away LocationType1, CreationTime_t
| extend LocationType = LocationType
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend LocationType = 'All', LocationTypes = '*'  
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10

let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let data = (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| join kind = inner 
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label);
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by DisplayName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DisplayName
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DisplayName
| order by TotalCount desc, DisplayName asc
| project DisplayName, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId , DisplayName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by DisplayName, UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on DisplayName, UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, DisplayName asc
| project DisplayName, UserId, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on DisplayName
| project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['DisplayName Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = DisplayName, Type = 'DisplayName', ['DisplayName Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['DisplayName Count'] desc, Name asc

let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| join kind = inner 
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| summarize Amount = count() by DisplayName, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now()) 
| sort by Amount
content.title: Label Usage over time

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
endpointdlp_CL 
| where Operation_s notcontains "Get-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "New-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "Set-"
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Operation' and Operation_s == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by Operation_s
content.title: Label Operations

content.query:
let details = dynamic({OperationDetail});
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist2 = (_GetWatchlist('MipMap'));
let dlp= (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
| extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
| extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
| extend Type = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "","ActionSource","")
| extend Value = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "","LabelEventType","")
| extend Value2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "","LocationType","")
| extend Value3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "",toint(TargetLocation_d),dynamic(""))
| extend old1 = tostring(SensitivityLabelEventData_OldSensitivityLabelId_g)
);
dlp
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type = tostring(Type)
)
on Type,Value
| extend ActionSource = Name
| join kind = leftouter  
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value2 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type2 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type2,Value2
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value3 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type3 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type3,Value3
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend old1 = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on old1
| extend label = DisplayName
| extend oldlabel = DisplayName1
| extend ActionSource = Name
| extend LabelEventType =Name1
| extend LocationType =Name2
| where LabelEventType !=""
| project UserId,FileSubject,Platform_s,ClientIP_s,label,ActionSource,LabelEventType,LocationType,Operation_s,oldlabel,Workload_s,TimeGenerated
| where "{Users:lable}"=="All" or UserId in ({Users})
| where details.Type == '*' or (details.Type == 'Operation' and Operation_s == details.Name) or (details.Type == 'UserId' and UserId == details.Name)
| summarize Number = count() by LabelEventType
content.title: Label Changes

content.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist2 = (_GetWatchlist('MipMap'));
let dlp= (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
| extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
| extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
| extend Type = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "","ActionSource","")
| extend Value = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "","LabelEventType","")
| extend Value2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "","LocationType","")
| extend Value3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "",toint(TargetLocation_d),dynamic(""))
| extend old1 = tostring(SensitivityLabelEventData_OldSensitivityLabelId_g)
);
dlp
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type = tostring(Type)
)
on Type,Value
| extend ActionSource = Name
| join kind = leftouter  
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value2 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type2 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type2,Value2
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value3 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type3 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type3,Value3
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend old1 = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on old1
| extend label = DisplayName
| extend oldlabel = DisplayName1
| extend ActionSource = Name
| extend LabelEventType =Name1
| extend LocationType =Name2
| project UserId,FileSubject,Platform_s,ClientIP_s,label,ActionSource,LabelEventType,LocationType,Operation_s,oldlabel,Workload_s,TimeGenerated
| summarize Number = count() by UserId,FileSubject,Platform_s,ClientIP_s,label,ActionSource,LabelEventType,LocationType,Operation_s,oldlabel,Workload_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: Label Details

content.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist2 = (_GetWatchlist('MipMap'));
let dlp= (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
| extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
| extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
| extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
| extend Type = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "","ActionSource","")
| extend Value = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "","LabelEventType","")
| extend Value2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "",toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d),dynamic(""))
| extend Type3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "","LocationType","")
| extend Value3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "",toint(TargetLocation_d),dynamic(""))
| extend old1 = tostring(SensitivityLabelEventData_OldSensitivityLabelId_g)
);
dlp
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on label
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type = tostring(Type)
)
on Type,Value
| extend ActionSource = Name
| join kind = leftouter  
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value2 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type2 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type2,Value2
| join kind = leftouter   
(
watchlist2 
| extend Value3 = toint(SearchKey)
| extend Type3 = tostring(Type)
)
on Type3,Value3
| join kind = leftouter
 ( 
watchlist
| extend old1 = tostring(ImmutableId)
)
on old1
| extend Label = DisplayName
| extend Oldlabel = DisplayName1
| extend ActionSource = Name
| extend LabelEventType =Name1
| extend LocationType =Name2
| where LabelEventType != "LabelUpgraded"
| where LabelEventType != ""
| project UserId,FileSubject,Platform_s,ClientIP_s,Label,ActionSource,LabelEventType,LocationType,Operation_s,Oldlabel,Workload_s,TimeGenerated
| summarize Number = count() by UserId,LabelEventType,FileSubject,Platform_s,ClientIP_s,Label,Oldlabel,ActionSource,LocationType,Operation_s,Workload_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| order by Number, TimeGenerated
content.title: Label Downgraded or Removed

content.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist2 = (_GetWatchlist('MipMap'));
let watchlist3 = (_GetWatchlist('UserAccounts'));
let dlp = (endpointdlp_CL
    | where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
    | extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
    | extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
    | extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
    | extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2), UserId_s, acct2)
    | extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
    | extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
    | extend Type = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "", "ActionSource", "")
    | extend Value = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d != "", toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_ActionSource_d), dynamic(""))
    | extend Type2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "", "LabelEventType", "")
    | extend Value2 = iff(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d != "", toint(SensitivityLabelEventData_LabelEventType_d), dynamic(""))
    | extend Type3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "", "department", "")
    | extend Value3 = iff(TargetLocation_d != "", toint(TargetLocation_d), dynamic(""))
    | extend old1 = tostring(SensitivityLabelEventData_OldSensitivityLabelId_g)
    );
let data = (dlp
| join kind = inner
    ( 
    watchlist
    | extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
    )
    on label
| join kind = leftouter   
    (
    watchlist2 
    | extend Value = toint(SearchKey)
    | extend Type = tostring(Type)
    )
    on Type, Value
| extend ActionSource = Name
| join kind = leftouter  
    (
    watchlist2 
    | extend Value2 = toint(SearchKey)
    | extend Type2 = tostring(Type)
    )
    on Type2, Value2
| join kind = leftouter   
    (
    watchlist2 
    | extend Value3 = toint(SearchKey)
    | extend Type3 = tostring(Type)
    )
    on Type3, Value3
| join kind = leftouter
    ( 
    watchlist
    | extend old1 = tostring(ImmutableId)
    )
    on old1
| join kind = leftouter
    ( 
    watchlist3
    | extend UserId = tostring(SearchKey)
    )
    on UserId
| extend label = DisplayName
| extend oldlabel = DisplayName1
| extend ActionSource = Name
| extend LabelEventType =Name1
);
data
| where department != ''
| summarize Count = count() by department
| project
    department = iff(department == '', department, department),
    Count = iff(department == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from ago(90d) to now() step 2d by department)
    on department
| project-away department, CreationTime_t
| extend department = department1
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on CreationTime_t from ago(90d) to now() step 2d
        | extend jkey = 1)
        on jkey     
        | extend department = 'All',department1 = 'All'
    )

| order by Count desc
| take 10

let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist3 = (_GetWatchlist('UserAccounts'));
let data = (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s notcontains "Get-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "New-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "Set-"
    | where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
    | extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
    | join kind = inner 
    (
            watchlist3
        | extend UserId = tostring(SearchKey)
        )
        on UserId
    | join kind = inner 
        ( 
        watchlist
        | extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
        )
        on label);
let appData = data
    | summarize TotalCount = count() by department
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range(ago(90d), now(), 2d) by department
        | project-away TimeGenerated)
        on department
    | order by TotalCount desc, department asc
    | project department, TotalCount, Trend
    | serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId, department,DisplayName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range(ago(90d), now(), 2d) by department, UserId,DisplayName
    | project-away TimeGenerated)
    on department, UserId, DisplayName
| order by TotalCount desc, department asc
| project department, UserId,DisplayName, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on department
| project
    Id,
    Name = UserId,
    Type = 'UserId',
    DisplayName,
    ['department Count'] = TotalCount,
    Trend,
    ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project
        Id,
        Name = department,
        Type = 'department',
        ['department Count'] = TotalCount,
        Trend)
| order by ['department Count'] desc, Name asc

let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist3 = (_GetWatchlist('UserAccounts'));
let data = (endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s notcontains "Get-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "New-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "Set-"
    | where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
    | extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
    | join kind = leftouter 
    (
            watchlist3
        | extend UserId = tostring(SearchKey)
        )
        on UserId
    | join kind = leftouter 
        ( 
        watchlist
        | extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
        )
        on label);
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Operation_s
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Operation_s
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Operation_s
| order by TotalCount desc, Operation_s asc
| project Operation_s, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by department , Operation_s
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Operation_s, department
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Operation_s, department
| order by TotalCount desc, Operation_s asc
| project Operation_s, department, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Operation_s
| project Id, Name = department, Type = 'department', ['Operation_ss Count'] = TotalCount, Trend,  ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Operation_s, Type = 'Operation_s', ['Operation_ss Count'] = TotalCount,  Trend)
| order by ['Operation_ss Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Label operations

content.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('Sensitive'));
let watchlist3 = (_GetWatchlist('UserAccounts'));
let data = endpointdlp_CL
| where Operation_s notcontains "Get-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "New-"
| where Operation_s notcontains "Set-"
    | where Operation_s contains "sensitivity"
    | extend File1 = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s), ItemName_s, SharePointMetaData_FilePathUrl_s)
| extend FileSubject = iff(isempty(File1), ObjectId_s, File1)
    | extend label = iff(isempty(LabelId_g), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g, LabelId_g)
| extend acct = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s), ExchangeMetaData_From_s, SharePointMetaData_FileOwner_s)
| extend acct2 =iff(isempty(acct), SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelOwnerEmail_s, acct)
| extend UserId =iff(isempty(acct2),UserId_s, acct2)
    | join kind = leftouter
    (
            watchlist3
        | extend UserId = tostring(SearchKey)
        )
        on UserId
    | join kind = leftouter
        ( 
        watchlist
        | extend label = tostring(ImmutableId)
        )
        on label    
| summarize Calls = count() by App = DisplayName, Request = Operation_s  , Dependency = department
| extend RequestId = strcat(App, '::', Request);
let links = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App, RequestId
| project SourceId = App, TargetId = RequestId, Calls, Kind = 'App -> Request'
| union (data
    | project SourceId = RequestId, TargetId = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Request -> Dependency');
let nodes = data
| summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by App
| project Id = App, Name = App, Calls, Kind = 'App'
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by RequestId, Request
    | project Id = RequestId, Name = Request, Calls, Kind = 'Request')
| union (data
    | summarize Calls = sum(Calls) by Dependency
    | project Id = Dependency, Name = Dependency, Calls, Kind = 'Dependency');
nodes
| union (links)
